resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104640</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104640</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201827</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mind Mapping the MDGs </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verstand, der das MDGs abbildet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Esprit traçant le MDGs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mente que traça o MDGs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mente che traccia il MDGs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μυαλό που χαρτογραφεί το MDGs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mente que asocia el MDGs</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For students who have had an introduction to the MDGs as a whole, this activity allows them to dig deeper into the issues of one particular Goal, while still developing an understanding of how all the Goals are connected. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für Kursteilnehmer, die eine Einleitung zum MDGs 
als Ganzes gehabt haben, erlaubt diese Aktivität ihnen, tieferes in 
die Ausgaben von einem bestimmten Ziel zu graben, beim noch entwickeln
ein Verständnis von, wie alle Ziele angeschlossen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour les étudiants qui ont eu une introduction au
MDGs dans l'ensemble, cette activité leur permet de creuser plus 
profond dans les questions d'un but particulier, tout en développant 
toujours un arrangement de la façon dont tous les buts sont reliés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para os estudantes que tiveram uma introdução ao
MDGs ao todo, esta atividade permite que escavem mais profundo nas 
introduções de um objetivo particular, ao ainda desenvolver uma 
compreensão de como todos os objetivos são conectados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per gli allievi che hanno avuti un'introduzione al
MDGs nell'insieme, questa attività li permette di scavare più 
profondo nelle emissioni di un obiettivo particolare, mentre ancora 
sviluppa una comprensione di come tutti gli obiettivi sono collegati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για τους σπουδαστές που είχαν μια εισαγωγή στο MDGs 
συνολικά, αυτή η δραστηριότητα επιτρέπει σε τους για να σκάψει 
βαθύτερο στα ζητήματα ενός ιδιαίτερου στόχου, ακόμα 
αναπτυσσόμενους μια κατανόηση για το πώς όλοι οι στόχοι 
συνδέονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para los estudiantes que han tenido una 
introducción al MDGs en su totalidad, esta actividad permite que 
caven más profundo en las aplicaciones una meta determinada, mientras
que todavía desarrolla una comprensión de cómo todas las metas 
están conectadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201827</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104640</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/mind-mapping-the-mdgs</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
